titleStmt.title: A target for tillage briefly containing the most necessary, pretious, and profitable vse thereof both for king and state. By Iohn Moore Minister of Gods word, and Parson of Knaptoft in Leicestershire. Anno 1611.
titleStmt.author: Moore, John, d. 1619.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted [by R. Field] for William Iones,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
